product_name: Brooks PureDrift Road-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's ultralight Brooks PureDrift Road-Running Shoes boast a stripped down, minimalist platform for a barely-there feel and enhanced connection with the ground. Lightweight uppers feature highly breathable polyester and nylon mesh with a rubber instep band to provide a comfortable, secure fit regardless of foot shape. Synthetic leather overlays provide lightweight support. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Remove the removable sockliners to provide a zero offset experience; seamless design ensures comfort. Dual Toe Flex splits in the toe box allow your forefoot to flex through its 3 functional units, encouraging natural balance and a springy push-off. Midsoles feature BioMoGo polymer alloy foam, which provides cushioning, energy return and reduced foot fatigue; nontoxic additive helps midsoles break down in landfill. Omega flex grooves enhance midsole flexibility while offering great cushioning. Low-profile rubber outsoles grip well on the road, sidewalk and gentle trails. Designed on an anatomical last, the minimalist Brooks PureDrift Running Shoes contour to the feet, providing a glovelike fit. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
